trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control and two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> controls that are used to set a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示一個處理 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 控制項位置和大小的原始控制項，以及兩個用來設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項沒有預設值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>實作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>控制項及兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項，可用來變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> on a slider.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>滑動軸上。

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider**
trans-unit.target: **滑桿上的追蹤**

trans-unit.source: ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb")
trans-unit.target: ![RepeatButton、 縮圖](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton、 縮圖")

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬性和對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>自動繫結到的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: 當任一屬性變更時，繫結的屬性也會變更。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 屬性

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬性和對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>屬性要繫結時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬性未明確設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 屬性

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬性和對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>屬性要繫結時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>屬性未明確設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 屬性

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>用來捲動內容的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制項是成比例的百分比會出現在可檢視區域或檢視區的內容。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示的範例<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>實作控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項。

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control**
trans-unit.target: **追蹤控制捲軸**

trans-unit.source: ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration")
trans-unit.target: ![捲軸圖例](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "捲軸圖例")

trans-unit.source: The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下列計算用於計算的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>。

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength
trans-unit.target: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength

trans-unit.source: The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize 參數為值的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 最大和最小參數會對應至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 最大運算式的值 – 最小 + viewportSize 是可捲動內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>屬性代表<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>內容捲動至底部的時。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>值不是相同長度或範圍的內容。

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細說明，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>會增加從上到下或從左到右的方向根據<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>會增加從下至上或從左到右的方向根據<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>。

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更增加值的方向，設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 所提供的區域。

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 的配置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 內容所使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that decreases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得會減少 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that reduces the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 時，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> 會減少 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是擁有預設設定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>樣式定義於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項範本時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see the [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[捲軸樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: 子項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 於指定的索引處取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 的子項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: 傳回位於虛擬子項目清單中指定索引處之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 索引必須是介於零 (0) 到 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> 屬性值減一 (1) 之間的數字。

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您指定之子項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會設定屬性的順序進行索引。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> 屬性值減一 (1)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得會增加 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 類別之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> 屬性的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 時，<see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> 會增加 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是擁有預設設定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>控制的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>樣式定義於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項範本時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否要從預設方向來反轉漸增 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 的方向。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" /> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" /> 已交換位置，且漸增值的方向也已反轉，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: 時的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>設`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>交換的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 值增加從左到右的這兩個水平<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>垂直值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>而，增加從上到下，為垂直<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>這些值增加從下至上。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>屬性`true`，增加值的方向會反轉。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項，而且您沒有明確設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>屬性內定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項範本時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 的最大可能 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: The largest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 的最大可允許 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性未明確設定，這個屬性會自動繫結與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項相當於減去可見內容區域的檢視區大小的可捲動內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property is 70.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果內容的大小是 100 和大小的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>屬性是 30，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>屬性就是 70。

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 這是 true 因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項對應中會出現在檢視區上方的可捲動內容的位置。

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 當內容捲動至最底部，在此範例中時，30%的內容仍會出現在檢視區。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is 70.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>對應的檢視區上方是 70，而<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>值是 70。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>對應中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>控制項。

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content")
trans-unit.target: ![值會對應到內容的位置](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "值會對應到內容的位置")

trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that becomes the binding source for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>會變成繫結來源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The size of the available space for the track.
trans-unit.target: 軌跡的可用空間大小。

trans-unit.source: Measures the layout size that is required for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> and its components.
trans-unit.target: 測量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 與其元件所需的配置大小。

trans-unit.source: The layout <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is required by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 所需的配置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 的最小可能 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: The smallest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 的最小允許 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項處於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性未明確設定，這個屬性會自動繫結與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that becomes the binding source for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>會變成繫結來源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 要垂直或水平顯示。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> enumeration value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> 要垂直或水平顯示或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項，而且您沒有明確設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項，而且您沒有明確設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 控制項，其用來變更 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 搭配使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是擁有預設設定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The placement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: 位置的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制對應至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項會反映那些的目前可見的內容量。

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is computed in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>計算如下：

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is not specified, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is a fixed default value.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>未指定屬性，大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>是固定的預設值。

trans-unit.source: This is how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> of a Track functions inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 這是如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>的追蹤函式內<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the following formula is used:
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>指定屬性和內容的大小大於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>，使用下列公式：

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize = TrackLength * ViewportSize / (Maximum – Minimum + ViewportSize)
trans-unit.target: 縮圖大小 = TrackLength * ViewportSize / （最多 – 最小值 + ViewportSize）

trans-unit.source: Where the parameters are defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 位置參數的定義方式如下：

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize
trans-unit.target: 縮圖大小

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in the same units as the TrackLength.
trans-unit.target: 大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制項 TrackLength 為相同的單位。

trans-unit.source: TrackLength
trans-unit.target: TrackLength

trans-unit.source: The length of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
trans-unit.target: 長度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>。

trans-unit.source: ViewportSize
trans-unit.target: ViewportSize

trans-unit.source: The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示內容的單位，例如文件的頁面數目在可捲動區域大小。

trans-unit.source: Maximum
trans-unit.target: 最大值

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.
trans-unit.target: 內容的單位，例如第 10 頁的 10 頁文件中的內容最大值。

trans-unit.source: Minimum
trans-unit.target: 最低

trans-unit.source: The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.
trans-unit.target: 內容的單位，例如文件的第 1 頁中的內容最小值。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示一些這些參數中的視覺表示法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: ![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length")
trans-unit.target: ![檢視區大小、 thumb 大小，以及滑桿長度](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "檢視區大小、 thumb 大小，以及滑桿長度")

trans-unit.source: If the size of the content is less than a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> does not appear and the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容的大小小於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>不會出現和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The minimum sizes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control are determined by two system parameters, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 最小大小為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制項由兩個系統參數，<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and the minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 最小大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>中垂直控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>是 1/2 *<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A>和最小大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>中在水平控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>是 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> style is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>內定義樣式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> as determined by the position of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 的目前值，該值取決於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> 控制項的位置。

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 的目前值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>表示之間的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項屬於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>控制項和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性未明確設定，這個屬性會自動繫結與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> 的水平替代。

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> 的垂直替代。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> moves.
trans-unit.target: 計算當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 移動時，在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> 中的變更。

trans-unit.source: The change in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> that corresponds to the displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 中的變更，與 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 的替代相對應。

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: 指定的點。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> to a specified point along the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 計算沿著 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 到指定點的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> and the specified <paramref name="pt" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 介於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> 到指定 <paramref name="pt" /> 值之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可見之可捲動內容的部分大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 可捲動內容之可見區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />，表示未定義內容大小。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>屬性用來計算的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>不<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要明確定義的大小<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，建立衍生自物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>類別，並提供覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>控制項，而且您沒有明確設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>控制項中實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>控制項一律是<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>控制項不會變更大小。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 的子項目數量。

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: 介於 0 到 2 之間的整數，用來指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 中的子項目數量。

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您指定之子項目的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 子項目會設定屬性的順序進行索引。
